title: [math] Moebius Transformation Revealed
content:
“Moebius Transformations Revealed”  
Douglas N. Arnold & Jonathan Rogness  
University of Minnesota, 2007

[Lo-res](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160641/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=JX3VmDgiFnY) (Youtube) ; [Hi-res](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160641/http:/www.ima.umn.edu/~arnold/moebius/moebius-movie.mov), 124 MB .mov.  
 [Science News](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160641/http:/www.sciencenews.org/articles/20071117/mathtrek.asp), 17.11.2007

 [‹ Wanted : Art Directors (London)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160641/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39811 "Go to previous forum topic") [Acronym questions ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160641/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39809 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Alessandro Segalini

comments.content: Nicely done. It’s worth the 2 1/2 minutes it takes to watch.
I’m particularly taken by the Tweety-Bird negative space created by the example; whooda thunkit?
